name: Decisive Battles of World War II: The Ardennes Offensive
name_original: Decisive Battles of World War II: The Ardennes Offensive
description:
Decisive Battles of World War II: The Ardennes Offensive is a strategy game developed by Strategic Studies Group. It came out on 01-01-1997. It was published by Strategic Simulations.
You can play Decisive Battles of World War II: The Ardennes Offensive on PC.
